comments: Number of partitions of an n-element set into an even number of classes.Let A(0) = 1, B(0) = 0; A(n+1) = Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n,k)*B(k), B(n+1) = Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n,k)*A(k); entry gives A sequence (cf. A024429).
